wikipedia_page.main: Professor Stephen Westaby FRCS (born 27 July 1948) is a British heart surgeon at John Radcliffe Hospital, Oxford, England. He won the award of Midlander of the Year in 2002.

response: *2002 - Stephen Westaby (heart surgeon at John Radcliffe Hospital)
